name: Tallulah's Pride Party - Sunday
description: Calling all queers! The best party on the block takes over the whole building for Queer Pride. Catch Toronto’s top drag and burlesque acts in a super-charged show, and stay late dancing to the hottest tracks with our guest DJs.

name: Soccer Club: Summer Day Camps
description:
Join the ultimate summer soccer camp experience! Since 1993, over 300,000 families have trusted the Royal City Soccer Club with creating unforgettable summer camps memories for children aged 5 to 13. With over 100 locations across six provinces, our camps combine fun and skill-building for all levels of soccer.

Mornings are filled with exciting soccer activities, while afternoons offer a refreshing leisure swim and fun camp games. Choose from full day or morning only sessions, with early and late pickup options to suit your schedule.  Camps run throughout July and August. Don’t miss out on a summer of fun, fitness, and friendships! For more details, give us a call or visit us our website.

name: The 45th Anniversary Dora Mavor Moore Awards
description:
You’re invited to Toronto's performing arts party of the year to celebrate the outstanding theatre, dance, and opera that filled our stages last season!

Hosted by Peter Fernandes, join the city’s artistic community to rub elbows with Toronto’s most celebrated stage artists, with red carpet interviews, VIP guests, musical performances, and a super fun party, all in one space.

organizer.name: Toronto Alliance for the Performing Arts

name: Summer Camp
description:
For over 40 years, the Columbus Centre has been providing high-quality camp programs for the children in our community. 

From the general all-in-one camp experience to specialty camps in tennis, cooking, ultimate sports, and more, the Columbus Centre’s experienced and specialized staff offer high-quality programming in an inclusive and inspiring environment for kids aged 4 to 13.

name: Rhythms of Canada
description: Experience Canada’s rich cultural tapestry with world-class performances, hands-on activities for all ages, and delicious food. See the entire site from the museum to the park, come alive with music, art, and vibrant celebration.

name: Lavazza IncluCity
description:
Where borders fade and cinema unites us. More than just a festival, it’s a vibrant celebration of film, culture, and the rich diversity that defines Canada. Enjoy music, with free concerts and amazing music every day. Taste gastronomy, featuring incredible bars and food vendors that bring global flavours to Toronto. And above all, enjoy cinema and watch stories that transport you, creating memories you’ll cherish forever.

This is all about you, your roots, your culture, and the fun of coming together. Join us for great films, good vibes, and unforgettable nights that make this festival a true celebration of inclusivity.
